quotes.quote: History is always made by the wisdom of the old and the passion of the young. Pave the way for a new age, youngsters of the next generation!
You're always above everyone else. But you make decisions and move forward by yourself, and no one can keep up with you. Even the much-loved sun is alone if no one can reach it.
Cry... yell... act tough... be proud of the way you live... LAUGH!
Everyone worries and suffers, but they still go on with their lives. I'm expecting to be able to laugh again, so it's too early to despair!
Listen here. Don't say you can't. Words bind you the minute you say them. Believe in yourself! You can do anything!
Who decided that if you cry, you're weak?
